snippet.title: Bear and Breakfast | Story Teaser - Meet Barbara
snippet.description:
Welcome to Pinefall, the little corner of the woods that needs a helping hand (paw?) in Bear and Breakfast. More: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1136370/Bear_and_Breakfast/

Coming to Nintendo Switch: https://www.nintendo.com/games/detail/bear-and-breakfast-switch/
Get more Bears in your life: https://www.bear.game
Hang out with us on Discord:  https://discord.gg/bearandbreakfast
